Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value to us and has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. We believe it could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its importance to us, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950000. This offer reflects our commitment to finding the right buyer who appreciates the true worth of this product. We look forward to discussing how this product can benefit you and potentially closing this deal. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
